scripts.coveragecore: istanbul cover --report html node_modules/.bin/_mocha tests/tests.js; open coverage/index.html
scripts.buildweb: mkdir dist; cp node_modules/lodash/lodash.min.js dist/lodash.js; cp node_modules//jquery/dist/jquery.min.js dist/jquery.js; babel src/steller.js --presets es2015-script --out-file dist/steller.babel.js; babel src/steller.web.js --presets es2015-script --out-file dist/steller.web.babel.js; cat node_modules/babel-polyfill/dist/polyfill.min.js dist/steller.babel.js dist/steller.web.babel.js > dist/steller.web.js; rm dist/steller.babel.js; rm dist/steller.web.babel.js
scripts.testwebprepare: babel src/steller.js --presets es2015-script --out-file tests/steller.es5.js; babel src/steller.web.js --presets es2015-script --out-file tests/steller.web.es5.js; babel tests/tests.web.js --presets es2015-script --out-file tests/tests.web.es5.js;
scripts.coverageweb: npm run testwebprepare; node tests/coveragewebignore.js; istanbul instrument tests/steller.web.es5.js > tests/steller.web.es5.ins.js; mocha-phantomjs tests/index.coverage.html --hooks tests/phantom_hooks.js; istanbul report html; open coverage/index.html
